My 7th grader picked this for her new school year and I’ve been so impressed. So many pockets! Great book bag for school. Seems durable and well made. I bought the smaller size but still PLENTY of room for all school needs, including a laptop. Also has a built in USB port. Not sure we’ll use that but it’s nice to have.

My high schooler picked this out because it’s very trendy looking. It’s fairly nice in person. Should last one school year. I wouldn’t expect it to make it two though. But for the price, the quality is great. I wish it were a tad larger but it holds a decent amount.

THIS IS A VERY LARGE BACKPACK. IT IS PERFECT FOR A YOUNG GIRL, MIDDLE SCHOOL AGED TO COLLEGE OR A YOUNG WOMAN. THE COLOR IS AMAZING. IT HAS A LOT OF DIFFERENT COMPARTMENTS AND ALSO CONNECTION TO KEEP A PHONE OR ELECTRICAL DEVICE CHARGED. OT ALSO EXPANDS TO BE BIGGER.

A great backpack. Plenty of room and a good price. Daughter loves it!

I got this backpack for travel due to all the compartments. It has two large compartments and quite a few smaller internal pockets, making it easy for you to stay organized. This was a well-made backpack with a strong canvas fabric that provided enough room as a laptop, carry-on bag for multiple flights across several weeks time. With a laptop, a tablet, a cell phone, a wallet, all of my liquids and a notebook there was still plenty of room to add an extra change of clothes if needed. I like this backpack. It has clever pockets and lots of them to help every student young and older get all their stuff from place to place. It's made with quality materials and is constructed well such that it feels higher-end; strong value. Recommend.

We needed a backpack for my daughter's new laptop plus all her sketch/art supplies. So, it needed to be well made and also have a feminine yet understated look (she's not a big fan of bright colors). So far this backpack has met or exceeded all her needs.  * Plenty of room: 14'' laptop, power adapter, her 8x11 sketch book, ~75 color pencils, 24 ink gels pens and a small 12-color watercolor palette. * It's well made, I inspected all zippers, seams and fabric. I would be surprised if this backpack doesn't last 4-5 years worth of use before needing to be replaced. * Looks-wise she loves it. The brown-beige combo is alluring to her.  Overall, this backpack checks all the boxes for us and if you have similar needs and tastes, you will find it equally good and a worthy purchase.
